title: Add animations, interactive elements, hero section, testimonials, countdown timer, carousel, and smooth scroll navigation

requirements.text: Add smooth hover effects, fade-in animations on scroll, and slide transitions throughout the app — apply to cards, sections, and list items so elements animate into view as users scroll down the page.

quotes: Animations - Smooth hover effects, fade-ins, and slide transitions to bring elements to life

acceptanceCriteria: Cards and section elements fade in or slide up when they enter the viewport
Hover effects are applied to interactive cards and navigation links
Transitions feel smooth and do not cause layout shift

requirements.text: Add pulse and ripple click animations to all primary call-to-action buttons and navigation action buttons across the app (e.g., 'Get Started', 'Generate Content', 'Upgrade', pricing tier buttons).

quotes: Interactive buttons - Pulse effects or ripple animations on click

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a primary button triggers a visible ripple or pulse effect
The animation completes without blocking the button's action
Effect is applied consistently across all CTA buttons

requirements.text: Add a bold hero section at the top of the LandingPage with a visually striking banner, a compelling headline, a short subheadline describing the product value, and a prominent call-to-action button linking to the pricing or sign-up flow.

quotes: Hero section - A bold banner with a call-to-action button to grab attention immediately

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section is the first visible section on the landing page
Contains a headline, subheadline, and at least one CTA button
Visually distinct from the rest of the page using background gradient or image treatment
CTA button links to the pricing page or triggers login

requirements.text: Add a testimonials/reviews section to the LandingPage featuring at least 3 fictional customer quotes with names, roles, and avatar initials to build trust with visitors.

quotes: Testimonials/reviews section - Build trust with customer quotes

acceptanceCriteria: Section displays at least 3 testimonial cards
Each card includes a quote, customer name, and role/title
Section is visually styled consistently with the app's vibrant color scheme

requirements.text: Add a countdown timer component to the LandingPage that counts down to a promotional deadline (e.g., a limited-time discount offer), creating urgency for visitors to sign up.

quotes: Countdown timer - Create urgency for promotions or limited offers

acceptanceCriteria: Countdown timer displays days, hours, minutes, and seconds
Timer updates every second in real time
Timer is placed in a prominent location on the landing page (e.g., near the hero or pricing section)
When countdown reaches zero, a fallback message is shown

requirements.text: Add an image carousel/gallery section to the LandingPage that visually showcases the product's features or use cases with auto-advancing slides, manual navigation arrows, and dot indicators.

quotes: Image carousel/gallery - Showcase products or services visually

acceptanceCriteria: Carousel displays at least 3 slides with image/illustration and descriptive text
Auto-advances every 4–5 seconds
Manual previous/next navigation arrows are present and functional
Dot indicators show the current slide position
Slides transition smoothly

requirements.text: Implement smooth scroll navigation on the LandingPage with anchor links in the header/navigation that scroll smoothly to corresponding sections (e.g., Features, How It Works, Pricing, Testimonials) on the same page.

quotes: Smooth scroll navigation - Professional feel with anchor links

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links on the landing page scroll smoothly to their target sections
Each major section of the landing page has a corresponding anchor ID
Active section is visually highlighted in the navigation as the user scrolls
Scroll behavior is smooth (CSS scroll-behavior: smooth or JS equivalent)

constraints: Do not modify files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
All new animations must respect prefers-reduced-motion accessibility setting
Testimonial customer data must be fictional/placeholder — no real personal data
nonGoals: No backend changes required for any of these features
No real countdown timer backend persistence — timer is frontend-only with a hardcoded end date
No real product images required — illustrations or placeholders acceptable for carousel
No changes to authentication or subscription logic

required: Abstract vibrant gradient hero banner illustration for marketing landing page (hero-banner.dim_1200x480.png)

Three feature showcase illustration cards for carousel slides showing analytics dashboard, content creation, and growth metrics with vibrant neon accents (carousel-slide-1.dim_800x400.png, carousel-slide-2.dim_800x400.png, carousel-slide-3.dim_800x400.png)
